content: click_ a yarn of serendipity pam knighton-haener macey ann square regardless of skill level please read through entire pattern before beginning macey ann is the second in a series of squares designed as a legacy for my grandchildren macey is uniquely creative and loves everything pretty and sparkly hook/finished size 11 x 11 4 5 mm crochet terms us terminology throughout skill level intermediate yarn and colors used i love this cotton worsted weight 100% cotton ▪ mini square a = buttercup b = rosy ii c = sage d = royalty e = ivory f = antique cream ▪ large square a = buttercup b = royalty c = mulberry d = deep teal e = olive f = ivory additional items needed stitch markers and darning needle stitches used double magic_ring blsc back loop single_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet standing stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet long treble_crochet long treble_crochet invisible join fphdc front post half double dtr double treble_crochet st s stitch/stitches crochet trtr triple treble_crochet space space blhdc back loop half double 2dc-cluster 2 double_crochet cluster chain chain crochet popcorn popcorn yo yarn over fpdc front post double_crochet bl round round long half_double_crochet long half_double_crochet picot single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet back-stitch fpsc front post single_crochet long double_crochet long double_crochet macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 1 of 11 double magic_ring fphdc video at a yarn of serendipity yo insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post so post is in front of hook yo pull up a loop standing stitch yo pull through all 3 loops on hook start with a slip_stitch on your hook insert your hook into designated st or chain space and finish long half_double_crochet st as normal yo insert hook into st and pull up a loop almost to video at a yarn of serendipity length of previous st yo and pull through 3 loops invisible join do not join after completing last st of round cut yarn and double_crochet pull yarn tail through st yo insert hook into st yo pull up a loop remove hook and yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times insert from back- fpdc to-front-to-back yo insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around of 2nd st of round post so post is in front of hook yo pull up a loop grab yarn and yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times gently pull through long double_crochet from the back yo insert hook into st and pull up a loop almost to insert hook from length of previous st bottom-to-top of yo and pull through 2 loops 2 times the center of last treble_crochet st of round pull yarn yo 2 times insert hook into st yo pull up a loop gently through st yo pull through 2 loops 3 times anchor join by drawing through any back loop of first and last sts of round and weave in ends long treble_crochet yo 2 times insert hook into st and pull up a loop video at a yarn
